headline.main: Alli's Magic Touch Helps Spurs Forge Into Second Spot
headline.print_headline: Alli's Magic Touch Helps Spurs Forge Into Second Spot

snippet: - Sadio Mane struck four minutes into stoppage time to give Liverpool a last-gasp 1-0 win over derby rivals Everton that lifted them into second place in the Premier League on Monday....

headline.main: Mane the Main Man as Last-Gasp Liverpool Triumph
headline.print_headline: Mane the Main Man as Last-Gasp Liverpool Triumph

lead_paragraph: - Sadio Mane struck four minutes into stoppage time to give Liverpool a last-gasp 1-0 win over derby rivals Everton that lifted them into second place in the Premier League on Monday.

snippet: Not for the first time this season, Jose Mourinho was left in a wretched mood after watching his Manchester United side control a Premier League match only to end up missing out on victory on Sunday....

headline.main: Tetchy Mourinho Adamant United Are Not Getting Any Luck
headline.print_headline: Tetchy Mourinho Adamant United Are Not Getting Any Luck

lead_paragraph: Not for the first time this season, Jose Mourinho was left in a wretched mood after watching his Manchester United side control a Premier League match only to end up missing out on victory on Sunday.

snippet: A few months after duelling for the Premier League title, Tottenham Hotspur and Leicester City have yet to rediscover last season's killer consistency and both have a point to prove in Saturday's clash at White Hart Lane....

headline.main: Last Season's Title Rivals to Resume Battle
headline.print_headline: Last Season's Title Rivals to Resume Battle

lead_paragraph: A few months after duelling for the Premier League title, Tottenham Hotspur and Leicester City have yet to rediscover last season's killer consistency and both have a point to prove in Saturday's clash at White Hart Lane.

snippet: - Jose Mourinho was humiliated on his Premier League return to Stamford Bridge where his former side Chelsea routed Manchester United 4-0 on Sunday,...

headline.main: Mourinho's United Routed on Return to Chelsea
headline.print_headline: Mourinho's United Routed on Return to Chelsea

lead_paragraph: - Jose Mourinho was humiliated on his Premier League return to Stamford Bridge where his former side Chelsea routed Manchester United 4-0 on Sunday,

snippet: Bounemouth have signed Ireland utility player Marc Wilson from fellow Premier League team Stoke City on a two-year deal, the south-coast club said on Monday....

headline.main: Bournemouth Sign Ireland Defender Wilson From Stoke
headline.print_headline: Bournemouth Sign Ireland Defender Wilson From Stoke

lead_paragraph: Bounemouth have signed Ireland utility player Marc Wilson from fellow Premier League team Stoke City on a two-year deal, the south-coast club said on Monday.

snippet: Sunderland chief executive Martin Bain has indicated that manager David Moyes is not in immediate danger of losing his job despite the club's woeful start to the season and backed the Scot's long-term vision....

headline.main: Sunderland CEO Expects Moyes' Approach to Pay Dividends
headline.print_headline: Sunderland CEO Expects Moyes' Approach to Pay Dividends

lead_paragraph: Sunderland chief executive Martin Bain has indicated that manager David Moyes is not in immediate danger of losing his job despite the club's woeful start to the season and backed the Scot's long-term vision.

snippet: Juergen Klopp has praised Daniel Sturridge's impact off the bench in Liverpool's 1-0 Premier League win at local rivals Everton on Monday after the striker's opportunistic shot bounced off the post to set up Sadio Mane's late winner....

headline.main: Klopp Hails Sturridge Impact Off Bench at Everton
headline.print_headline: Klopp Hails Sturridge Impact Off Bench at Everton

lead_paragraph: Juergen Klopp has praised Daniel Sturridge's impact off the bench in Liverpool's 1-0 Premier League win at local rivals Everton on Monday after the striker's opportunistic shot bounced off the post to set up Sadio Mane's late winner.

snippet: Celtic manager Brendan Rodgers will turn to the goalkeeper he dropped for their Champions League group match against Manchester City....

headline.main: Gordon Keeps Place as Celtic Bid to Forget Barca Drubbing
headline.print_headline: Gordon Keeps Place as Celtic Bid to Forget Barca Drubbing

lead_paragraph: Celtic manager Brendan Rodgers will turn to the goalkeeper he dropped for their Champions League group match against Manchester City.

snippet: Ryan Giggs is optimistic about Manchester United's chances of beating derby rivals Manchester City to the final Champions League spot by ending the Premier League season in fourth place....

headline.main: Giggs Asserts Fourth Place Possible in 'Freak' Season
headline.print_headline: Giggs Asserts Fourth Place Possible in 'Freak' Season

lead_paragraph: Ryan Giggs is optimistic about Manchester United's chances of beating derby rivals Manchester City to the final Champions League spot by ending the Premier League season in fourth place.
